item.title: Ferry carrying over 350 people sinks in Philippines, killing at least 15
item.description: The coastguard says at least 316 people have been rescued so far, while 28 others remain missing.

item.title: Ferry with more than 350 people sinks in the southern Philippines leaving at least 15 dead - AP News
item.description: Ferry with more than 350 people sinks in the southern Philippines leaving at least 15 dead AP NewsFerry carrying more than 350 people sinks in southern Philippines CNNDeath toll in Philippine boat accident climbs to 15, hundreds rescued ReutersFifteen dead after ferry with 300 passengers sinks in Philippines BBCPhilippines ferry with 350 on board capsizes leaving 15 dead and dozens missing The Guardian

item.title: People cling to treetops as 'worst floods in a generation' sweep Mozambique
item.description: The worst flooding in a generation hits Mozambique with teams from Brazil, South Africa and the UK helping with the rescue.

item.title: Scientists asked 800 people to compare penis sizes. Here’s what they found - BBC Science Focus Magazine
item.description: Scientists asked 800 people to compare penis sizes. Here’s what they found BBC Science Focus MagazineWhy are human penises so large? New evolutionary study finds two main reasons The ConversationMen assume bigger is always better – women disagree, says University of Western Australia study The TelegraphThe long and short of it: Human penis size evolved for both attraction and rivalry, study suggests News-MedicalNew study reveals what life is really…
